typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Imports as (companyname as string, location as string, satellites as string[], goods as (trade as boolean, customers as string[], orders as (orderId as string, orderTotal as double, shipped as (orderItems as (itemName as string, itemQty as string)[]))[]))[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(Imports.goods.orders.shipped.orderItems),
	mapColumn(
		companyname = Imports,
		orderid = Imports,
		itemname = Imports,
		itemqty = Imports,
		location = Imports
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 select(mapColumn(
		companyname,
		orderid = companyname.goods.orders[1].orderId,
		itemname = companyname.goods.orders[1].shipped.orderItems[1].itemName,
		itemqty = companyname.goods.orders[1].shipped.orderItems[1].itemQty,
		location = orderid.location
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
